Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Allows for child beneficiaries of deceased police officers and firefighters to receive accidental death benefits until age twenty-six
Summary: Allows for child beneficiaries of deceased police officers and firefighters to receive accidental death benefits until age twenty-six.
LawCode: Amd §§208-b & 208-f, Gen Muni L; amd §§361 & 361-a, R & SS L; amd §13-244, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, the retirement and social security law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing for child beneficiaries of deceased police officers and firefighters to receive accidental death benefits until age twenty-six
